Game.Name: Spiral Wave (Japan)
Game.plot: Spiral Wave is a Shoot-'Em-Up game, published by Media Rings, which was released in Japan in 1991.http://www.gamefaqs.com/console/turbo16/home/589118.htmlCheat: CodesAt the title screen, where it says "Push Run Button", press the following buttons:
Game.Notes: The player directs a spaceship to various planets, conversing with the native aliens and occasionally fighting them. The game splits its time from the cockpit of the ship, where dialogue scenes and decisions are made, and a Z-axis shoot 'em up in which the player takes down hostiles and asteroids. Through encounters and combat, the player earns energy which can be spent on upgrading their ship.
